effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder by 2% stacking up to 8 times. Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: While Shadow Dance is active, you cannot lose Winning Streak!, gain an additional stack of Winning Streak! each time you would gain one, and deal an additional 2% Shadow Damage per Winning Streak! stack.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder by 2% stacking up to 8 times. Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: While Shadow Dance is active, you cannot lose Winning Streak!, gain an additional stack of Winning Streak! each time you would gain one, and deal an additional 2% Shadow Damage per Winning Streak! stack.

spells.description: Equip: Proclaim your fashion sense to the world.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

sockets.display_string:
Carelessly cross a few frayed wires within the vicinity of a fallen ally in a desperate attempt to jolt them back to life with 60% health and 20% mana. Castable in combat. What could possibly go wrong?

Cannot be used by players higher than level 70.

spells.description: Equip: Safety fuses built into this device reduce the chance of its slotted tinker malfunctioning by up to 15%. Does not stack with similar specialization bonuses.

sockets.display_string: +159 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 10,907 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Improvised Seaforium Pacemaker

spells.description:
Equip: Repurpose a Seaforium charge to give your heart a kick, causing your first ability every 60 sec to trigger Explosive Adrenaline, granting 3,557 Critical Strike for 15 sec.

While exploding, Critical Strikes cause you to blow up again, extending this duration by 1 sec, up to 15 times.

description: It's just crazy enough to work...

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
Use: Teleports the caster to Hellscream's Grasp  on Tol Barad. (4 Hr Cooldown)
